name: Agawa Canyon Cordura Sheath
description: Transport your Boreal 15 saw in style with this rugged Cordura™ sheath.Cordura wears well and dries quickly.Extra blade compartment lets you carry a back-up, a different type of blade, or both.Compact pocket on the top flap for extra hardware or other small items.Long webbing mounting strap on the back gives multiple carry options.Secure snap closure.
